attributes.action: Call for a early General election
attributes.additional_details: The people need to be heard and we want change now
attributes.background:
We did not vote in liz truss as Conservative leader. The party has fallen at the seams and not helping thd millions of households that need emergency help now. Only interested in helping the rich.
The people should now decide on a new leader when heading into a recession.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
